plugin.description: The main storage plugin to load

readingPlugin.description: The storage plugin to load for readings data.

threads.description: The number of threads to run

managedStatus.description: Control if Fledge should manage the storage provider

managementPort.description: The management port to listen on.

logLevel.description: Minimum level of messages to log

workerPool.description: The number of threads to create in the thread pool used to execute operations against reading data

timeout.description: Server request timeout, expressed in seconds
